meta.label: Internal -  import project
meta.description: Import projects from instance with associated code env.

params.name: remote_host
params.label: Source Instance Address
params.description: Specify the location (URL) of the instance to copy the project to. (Required)

params.name: api_key
params.label: Remote API key
params.description: Specify the API key of the destination instance. (Required)

params.name: project_to_import
params.label: Project ID
params.description: Specify the project you want to import (Required)

params.name: ignore_ssl_certs
params.label: Ignore SSL Certificates
params.description: If selected, ignores SSL certificates on remote instance.
